alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 24 at 3:40AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
